job.title: Software Engineer

secure data and networks partnerships and passion our innovations and solutions help individuals financial institutions governments and businesses realize their greatest potential Our decency quotient or DQ drives our culture and everything we do inside and outside of our company We cultivate a culture of inclusion for all employees that respects their individual strengths views and experiences We believe that our differences enable us to be a better team  one that makes better decisions drives innovation and delivers better business resultsbrbrstrongJob TitlebrbrstrongSoftware EngineerbrbrExperiences make life more meaningfulbrbrPricelesscom is the platform for our Priceless Cities program  available exclusively to Mastercard cardholders It provides access to unforgettable experiences in the cities where we live and travel Help fuel passions and enable lifelong memories Start Something PricelessbrbrWe are looking for a Software Development Engineer to help us scale pricelesscombrbrIn this role you will be a key player in the Development team This is a fullstack engineering role You will apply your broad knowledge of modern web software technologies to design and build leading edge easytouse web interfaces and web services that drive our exciting platform We are looking for a motivated handson individual who will proactively seek ways to improve our product software architecture and development processbrbrstronguQualificationsRequirementsbrustrongulli BS degree or MS degree or equivalent in Computer Sciencelili Strong knowledge and experience with PHP
